name: License Alert - Basic Implementation
description: When there is a new command to Slack Workbot, do action and other actions

block.name: search_sobjects
block.title: Search User licenses
block.description: Search for User licenses in Salesforce

conditions.lhs: ["Cloud Integration User", "Chatter External", "Chatter Free", "Guest User License"]

block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Package licenses using SOQL query WHERE clause
block.description: Search Package licenses using SOQL query WHERE clause in Salesforce
block.comment: Search for 'Q-Assign' and 'Gainsight CSM' Package Licenses in Salesforce

block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Permission set licenses using SOQL query WHERE clause
block.description: Search Permission set licenses using SOQL query WHERE clause in Salesforce

input.query: MasterLabel IN ('Salesforce CPQ License', 'Salesforce CPQ AA License', 'Inbox') AND Status = 'Active'

block.comment: Search for 'Salesforce CPQ' and 'Advance Approval' Permission Set  Licenses in Salesforce

data.type: =_('data.foreach.28445933.MasterLabel').strip == "Salesforce CPQ License" ? "Salesforce CPQ" : (_('data.foreach.28445933.MasterLabel').strip == "Salesforce CPQ AA License" ? "Advanced Approvals" : "Inbox")

block.name: search_sobjects_soql
block.title: Search Users using SOQL
block.description: Search Users using SOQL query in Salesforce

extended_input_schema.name: include_combined_attachments
extended_input_schema.label: Select combined attachments
extended_input_schema.hint: Select Yes to obtain data from notes, attachments and files associated to the queried records. Default value is Yes.
